column4: good evening, I was wondering if someone could help me with an issue
I upgraded to 9.04 about 3 weeks ago from 8.10. before upgrading Linux would mount my LG VU as a mass media storage device no problem. afterward it wont see it
wish they would fix it already. any ideas on a work around?
i wasnt referring to ur issue
have u tried adding usb_storage to /etc/modules
under lsusb i can see it
im not sure of the mount point.... sda??
i cant get it to mount manually either
how can i find out which mount point it would use?
the FCC decided it would be a good name
